title: Healer
description: Failing at the last hurdle to become a top flight medic was devastating for the proud Loreli Rhuishtin. However life seems to have another plan for her as she meets up with a devastatingly handsome offworlder on her way off the planet of her birth. A man who insists that the ‘souls’ she sees hovering around people are actually their emotions. To her amazement, this ability that has caused her nothing but pain throughout her life could in fact make her one of the most important, privileged and long lived people in the galaxy.Unfortunately life is never that simple, and there is always a price to pay for fame and fortune.
author: E. Jaye
